Tucson had gotten Lord Elder's message.  He wasn't quite sure who Nightstri=
ke worked for, and was happy for the word up.

"Thank you Lord Elder, I sho=
uld have asked that before I left, my bad. Tucson Prime out.  Sorry Lord Pe=
rseus, it was Lord Elder. I'm glad he contacted me because I didn't know th=
at Nightstrike wasn't one of Hydras' men.  But, I still need to question hi=
m of course.  It's great to actually see you this time, sir."

He salutes L=
ord Perseus, and then looks over to Talon who smiles back to him.  He had n=
ot forgotten her.  He had strong feelings for her and was happy to see her =
for the first time.

" You're even more beautiful than I imagined before I =
could see you.  When I'm finished, I'd really like to - well.. You know um,=
 get to know you a little better..  Er... I'm not good at this..  Anyway, I=
 have to go."

He visibly turns a slight shade of red around his optics.  H=
e then gathers himself to prepare to question Nightstrike as to Unicron's i=
ntentions.  He knew he had several things happening at once, and to be a Pr=
ime to him, meant he had to be well rounded.  He also felt that Unicron's o=
bjectives had something to do with the opression that was hovering over the=
 planet.  As always, he was curious as to why things were happening.

" If =
it's all right with both of you, I'd like to ask Nightstrike some questions=
.  When in doubt, seek the answers from unlikely resources...  Something I =
kind of learned on my own."
